name: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate
description: Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough... She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock's ticking now... There are 90 days left!

name: Icarus: Climb to Olympus
description: Swing your hammer and spread your wings as you make the difficult climb to the top of Mount Olympus.

name: DotSec
description: DotSec is a modern hacking simulator where you can choose your path as a Black Hat, White Hat, or Gray Hat hacker. The choices you make will directly impact your journey through the hacking world while also guiding you through complex puzzles and challenges.

name: Farming Sim 25: Drive Tractors, Combine, Trucks
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Great Star
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Hyper Speeder
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - King Meteor
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Queen Meteor
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Twin Noritta
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Little Wyvern
Supermarket
description: Run your own supermarket in this chaotic co-op/singleplayer simulator! Stock shelves, manage customers, and overcome quirky challenges in a lively, customizable store. Work solo or team up with friends for hilarious, fast-paced fun.

name: F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - White Land: Yeti Foot
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Mist Flow: Screw
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Silence: Kamitoba
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Illusion: Ace of Hearts
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Port Town: Falcon
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Lightning: Light Bulb
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Sand Ocean: Make or Break
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Big Blue: Pigeon
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Lightning: Grid Maze
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Mute City: Counter
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Port Town: Dukedom Circuit
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Red Canyon: Dirt Dart
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Mist Flow: Flower 3
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Red Canyon: Best Choice
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Illusion: Death Hand
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Fire Field: Rumble Grand
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - White Land: Vingt-Cinq Rink
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Sand Ocean: Undulation Wave
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Red Canyon: Dorakon
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Mute City: Tiles Square
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Sonic Phantom
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Night Thunder
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Moon Shadow
F-Zero: Falcon Densetsu e+ - Elegance Liberty
Everspace 2: Wrath of the Ancients
description: The Ancients have awakened! Their wrath has laid waste to human settlements in Cluster 34, and the path of destruction leads to the Okkar Homeworlds. Take flight in this massive expansion DLC as the Cluster readies for war once again in EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients.

name: Uncursed
description:
Uncursed is a co-op pirate adventure where you rescue lost souls, loot shiny treasures, items and uncover secrets so dark even your torch might quit. Survive deadly dungeons, face unpredictable weather, and the occasional chaos caused by your crewmates—all while gathering loot to buy a ship, buy cool gear, and maybe splurge on a new hat.

Your crew's goal is to buy and repair a ship to reach more distant waters and shed light on the threatening secret.

Explore the surrounding islands alone or in a team, collect valuable items and the souls attached to them. Every day you can take part in a new adventure in the procedurally generated dungeon, which rewards you with valuable treasures if you survive its terrifying creatures and cunning traps.

name: Speedrun Academie
description:
In this first-person game, you’ll need to master every movement, optimize your trajectory, and maintain your momentum if you want to reach the finish. Every level is a challenge where slowing down isn’t an option, and mistakes aren’t forgiven.

Your mission is simple: start at point A, reach point B as fast as possible… but only a true speedrunner can shine.

name: Looking For Fael
description:
Upon receiving a cryptic voicemail from your missing roommate, the ordinary confines of your apartment transform into a surreal labyrinth. Guided by his voice and a custom retro console in hand, embark on a journey to decipher the mysteries that have twisted your home into an enigmatic maze.

But beware. The further you venture into other realities, the harder it will be to find your way back.

name: Conjunctivitalizer
description: Take on six stages of vertical shooting mayhem full of looney pixel art characters and locales. Gamers who are tired of bullet hell and Compile-like shooters can finally rejoice.

name: Idle Research 2
description: Idle Research 2 is an addictive, heavily-layered, incremental game themed around energy and resource management. It brings strategy, QOL, and feature synergism to the next level. The game takes place in 2070 on planet Mu Ra Tempel after the devasting Earth-27 Mutually Assured Destruction incident.

name: Lored
description: An idle game about collecting cancer with quirky stickfigures!

name: Dice Eater
description: Dice Eater is a mystery card game based around supernatural powers where players must use their power to uncover the other player's tricks. Use your opponent's tricks against them to turn the tables and win.

name: CarX Drift Racing 3
description:
Assemble your very own unique drift car, adjust every part, and conquer iconic tracks! Burn rubber, tune your car, and win. Become a legend in the world of drifting!

Welcome to the world of drift, now in your pocket!

CarX Drift Racing 3 is the long-awaited sequel in the legendary game series from developer CarX Technologies. Assemble your very own unique drift car from scratch and compete in tandem races with players all over the world!

name: The Little Moon
description: Storytelling, Side-scroller, Universe, Travel, Fishing, Action, Adventure.

name: Sproing
description:
Sproing is a foddian-inspired speedrun rage bouncing physics platformer.

Take control of an evolving alien creature as you escape an experimental bio lab, bouncing your way up through an alien planet, mutating with new abilities, to reach your space ship and launch off planet.

Developed by Funk Games, currently in Alpha state, released on itch: https://funkgames.itch.io/sproing

name: Big's Fishing Quest
description: One day Big the Cat was going to fish on his favorite fishing river and he noticed that the river was polluted and all the fishes were gone! So he begin a quest to find the culprits and make justice

name: Skye Revival
description: A cyberpunk 2D Beat Em Up Platformer by Komic Studios. Control Vega, a Skye City Defender and restore your city from corruption.

name: Salvagers
description: A 3rd person game centred around escort missions where you play as a hero trying to save as many people as they can in the middle of a mass take over within 6 minutes. rescue all 15 civilians in the shortest amount of time possible.

name: Lost Traces: Unsolved Cases - Genesis
description: Experience the beginning of the "Lost Traces" series through the eyes of Evelyn Strom in an immersive first-person view. Explore and collect clues to assist you in the search for Evelyn’s brother and help you unravel the mystery of what is really going on.

name: CitaDrill
description: Captain a giant drill in this basebuilder roguelite with a combination of action and strategy! Build, explore, and survive in a world inspired by 1-bit aesthetics. Who will win: the abyss and its fearsome tests, or your mettle and paw-some cat crew?

name: Solomania
description: Solomania is a romance drama about flawed heroes and their collateral damage. With your new reluctant partner, prove that you're not as messed up as everyone thinks. Your mission? Investigate a strange civilian report in the woods, smoothly and without issue. Playing nice is optional.

name: In Ashes
description: An unexpected quest has reached your sleepy town. Once again, you must raise your weapon and step into the boots of a weary, burnt out adventurer. When faced with a choice, what kind of hero will you be? In Ashes is a choice-driven fantasy visual novel about adventurers, monsters, and the forgotten.

name: Method of Entry
description:
"Method of Entry" is an upcoming 5v5 tactical shooter aimed at revitalizing the genre with a focus on competitive play, enhanced by authentic mechanics. The game's development is guided by our 'C.F.R.F' principle: 'Competitive First, Realism Follows,' which prioritizes competitive elements in gameplay decisions and design.

MoE is designed to be accessible and engaging, avoiding the complex hero abilities or arcade-style power-ups that have infiltrated the genre, and instead emphasizing realistic Special Forces or Counter-Terrorist scenarios that enforce, or dare we say, demand genuine skill. Drawing inspiration from foundational titles like the SWAT and the Rainbow 6 series, as well as classics like Counter-Strike and contemporary games like Escape from Tarkov and Rainbow Six Siege, "Method of Entry" taps into a deep well of tactical shooter heritage.

This project is a response to the competitive community's desire for a streamlined, 5v5 tactical shooter where competitive elements take precedence. Realism is then seamlessly integrated, with attention to weapon dynamics, player movement, environmental design, hit detection, and overall intensity. However, this integration never overshadows MoE’s core competitive mechanics, ensuring a balanced and stable competitive experience.

name: Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Hell Amb. (Hero Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Redking (Hero Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Ultraman (Hero Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Kamen Rider V3 (Hero Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Doraemon (Comics Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Dr. Eggman (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Sonic (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Kirby (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Kunio (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Yossy (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Koopa (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Luigi (Game Ichizoku)
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Mario (Game Ichizoku)
Choose Cthulhu Files: The Call of Cthulhu
description: Choose Cthulhu Files is a visual novel / adventure videogame adaption of the internationally acclaimed gamebook series Choose Cthulhu, based on the original works from H.P. Lovecraft and the Cthulhu Mythos, where you experience the story as the protagonist deciding how the story ends depending on your choices during the adventure.

name: The Weather Up There
description: Tropius, one of many humans-turned-Pokémon in the Clover Guild, has been struggling to adapt to his new form. He finds a job with a reward that might help him, but he can't do it alone. Reluctantly recruiting the help of some infamously incompetent guildmates, will Tropius be able to weather the storm?

name: Remember Christmas
description: Celebrate the holiday season with Remember Christmas, a festive card-matching memory game perfect for all ages! Flip cards to reveal delightful Christmas-themed icons like snowmen, candy canes, and Santa himself, while testing your memory across increasing levels of fun and challenge. With cheerful visuals, cozy music, and endless holiday spirit, it’s the perfect way to make your gaming season merry and bright!

name: Geometry Genius: Shapes
description: Geometry Genius: Shapes is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated geometry problems. Players identify the right shape by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening geometry skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Backrooms Level X
description: Enter the disturbing world of Backrooms Level X, a first-person narrative survival horror game that immerses you in an endless labyrinth of desolate and liminal spaces. 13 levels and giant enemies await you in this unique experience.

name: Downhill
description: Experience unlimited power in DOWNHILL, a unique 4th wall breaking action RPG. Take control of a human girl named Fade and become her best friend or her worst enemy as you guide her down the mountain. Her fate is yours to decide, as well as the entire realm's.

name: C-Beams
description: Pilot your ship through a perilous black hole system in this Space Action RPG. Engage in advanced ship combat, haul rare elements, and upgrade your vessel to survive. Stunning visuals, a deep narrative, and a rewarding progression system await as you uncover the abyss's dark secrets.

name: Fear The Reaper
description: Fear The Reaper is a PVP multiplayer horror game in which players take on unique roles and live out the experience of starring in a slasher film.

name: Book Bound
description: Book Bound is a cozy bookshop simulation game. Use a range of items to decorate your shop and make it truly yours. Pick the books you would like to sell. Help customers find books they want most. Sell books in different genres.

name: Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Koopa
Barcode Battler II: Shogaku Ninensei Special Barcode Card - Mario
Barcode Battler II: Senyou Card Software - Super Mario Kart

Plumbum
description: Plumbum is a retro top-down shooter roguelike where you'll have to survive the innumerable hordes of mooks and goons in the cursed corridors of this cursed game. Will you survive as long as you can, or will you die trying?

name: Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Jumpbahn

Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Peach
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Yossy
Donna: The Canine Quest
description: Embark on a paw-some journey in Donna: The Canine Quest! Dive into a world of heroic hounds, where each thrilling battle and loot discovery keeps the excitement at its peak. With cute pixel-art graphics and satisfying gameplay this tail-wagging adventure will have you barking for more!

name: Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Luigi
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario Kart - Mario
Perdition's Gate Resurgence
description: Perditions Gate Resurgence is a vanilla compatible megawad that serves as an unofficial community sequel to Perdition's Gate.

name: Muffles' Life Sentence
description: Take back your identity in Muffles’ Life Sentence- a darkly quirky RPG set in a prison where inmates are remade to match their crimes.

name: Angry Video Game Nerd 8-bit
description: The Angry Video Game Nerd is back in 8-bits! Battle through frantic platforming levels, defeat classic AVGN bosses, and save all of gaming from a corrupted monstrosity.

name: Yes Comrade
description:
Yes Comrade is a multiplayer survival sandbox where players have been based at a remote military lighthouse to complete tasks in the name of the country’s sea defence, however not everything may be as it seems.

Yes Comrade is a multiplayer survival sandbox where players have been based at a remote military lighthouse to complete tasks in the name of the country’s sea defence.

name: Amanaha hockey
description: Amanaha Hockey is a first-person multiplayer hockey game where you play as a skater or a goaltender. This semi-realistic, physics-based game gives you full control of your player and the movement of your hockey stick.

name: Emergency Exit
description: Communicate. Cooperate. Escape. aEmergency Exit is an online cooperative escape/puzzle game with asymmetric gameplay. Separated and unable to see each other’s actions, players must cooperate to reach the exit before time runs out, solving puzzles and uncovering hidden secrets.

name: Frogz
description: Frogz is a chaotic and fun multiplayer party game where players compete in a series of unique minigames! Customize your frog, join friends online, where customizing your frog is just the beginning: face a variety of unique minigames.

name: Skullivan's
description: Operate your own cemetery convenience store, catering a mix of ghostly customers, ghoulish guests, and eerie creatures. Stock your shelves with spine-chilling products and hire an unlikely team of spectral staff. Expand and design your spooky mansion, creating a uniquely haunted shopping experience.

name: Xontainer Meta Space
description: Xontainer Meta Space is a logistics simulation game with advanced AI NPCs you can interact with via voice or text. Manage trucks, customize vehicles, complete warehouse missions, operate forklifts, generate energy, and use an in-game smartphone for tasks, calls, and money transfers.

name: Woods of War
description: Woods of War is tower defense meets deck builder. Build your tree's defenses from cards you are dealt. As you defeat the orcs, earn new cards, customize your deck and unlock new levels of power. It is your elvish duty to fend off the deadly horde for in this forest, sap runs thicker than blood.

name: Endless Legend 2
description: With a mysterious, ever-changing world, unique factions, and epic storytelling, the much-awaited sequel to the strategy game classic ENDLESS Legend is here, opening a new chapter of the award-winning ENDLESS universe. Write your legend and unveil the secrets of a dreamlike ocean-planet on the verge of extinction.

name: Thyranya
description:
Thyranya is a free-to-play old-style MMORPG with a vast open world to be explored, dangerous creatures, rewarding quests and a lot of social content!

Dive into a world that pays homage to the classics like Diablo, Tibia, and League of Legends, yet stands out with its unique vibe. Thyranya is more than just a game; it's a blend of nostalgia and innovation, crafted from our passion for those unforgettable late-night gaming marathons. Here, you'll find everything from pixel art magic and epic boss battles to smooth animations, crisp graphics, and a fluid combat system designed for today's gamers. Join us on this journey and experience the essence of gaming, right from our hearts to your screen. Subscribe for a front-row seat to all things Thyranya—where every play feels like coming home, yet embarking on an adventure anew.

name: Star Crafter
description:
A space survival crafting mining base building and star system building game.
Craft rockets to create planets and Dyson Rings, mine and craft advanced materials, terraform the terrain, manage electricity, farm food, and more as you watch the star system evolve into stunning, everchanging views.

name: Boo! Are you scared?
description: "Boo! Are you scared?" – game with realistic physics of collisions and destruction, where every step can be the last. Gloomy levels full of dangerous obstacles and bottomless abysses await you.

name: Over the Hill
description: Explore the world in the golden age of offroading. Drive iconic vehicles from the 60s to 80s by yourself or with friends through challenging trails and beautiful scenery.

name: Bonnie Fell
description: Behind this cute potion-making game lies a choice-driven RPG. Will you solve problems or swindle customers with devious tricks?

name: Torchless
description: Torchless is a dark and gothic dungeon crawler RPG played through a text-based retro console. Forge your party and take up arms against the horrors lurking within the dungeon halls in strategic, turn-based combat, clinging on to survival using everything at your disposal.

name: Roost
description: 'ROOST' is a brief atmospheric First Person Horror-Exploration game, set in the fictional North-East English town of Mournbrough - a place harbouring dark secrets and seemingly lost to time. Welcome to your happy place.

name: Night Hazard
description: A Dark Fantasy Action Hack N' Slash RPG Discover powerful weapons and tear demons and monsters apart in a stylish frenzy as you explore a mythical dystopian world.

name: Order 13
description: Pack orders and ship them out. But the warehouse holds more than just inventory.

name: Keziah's Realm
description: Forage, craft, fight, form clans, and expand your settlements in a dynamic, ever-changing ecosystem. Keziah’s Realm offers a unique gaming experience where you must survive in a rich, procedurally generated world, alongside intelligent NPCs who possess abilities equal to those of the player.

name: The Conductor
description: Be the conductor. Manage the train and keep on time. Control the passengers, or also serve them. It´s not a easy job to be a conductor.

name: Last Victim: House of Fear
description: This is an indie horror game in which you have to face your fear and escape from house by solving puzzles and escaping from a ghost. Find out the story of a serial killer...

name: The Legend of Thabor: Rise of the Mages
Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade: Aname Momo - Collaboration Commemorative Residentization DLC
Soccer VR
description: Dive into the immersive world of VR soccer (football)! Experience the thrill of a full match with three difficulty levels and various formations. Refine your skills in dedicated practice modes, including penalties, free kicks, curved shots, cross finishing, and ball smashing.

name: Blueman
description: In this eerie world, illusion seems more real than anything else. Trying to escape is already madness. But are you ready to plunge even deeper into this insanity in order to save yourself?

name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Survivor is a roguelite where you upgrade your character by killing hordes to become strong enough to take on their boss and gain their abilities!

name: Bundle
description:
Corgi´s Travel
Journey To The Blue Montain
Escape From The Island

name: Turbo Taskforce: Remote Racing Ruckus
description: Gather your friends to assemble your racing vehicle and together, drive it across the track. Select from a wide array of parts and adapt your vehicle to the challenges ahead. Can you put everything together in 90 seconds and then make the best time on the track?

name: Ginger
description: Kevin wants to know what home is, so he writes a novel within a dictionary. Welcome to the unbeatable home.

name: Vanguard Exiles
description: Vanguard Exiles is a new style of auto-battler designed by legendary game designer, Richard Garfield. Each player pits their Squad against their opponent in an ever-changing environment. Each Squad has its own unique identity and is comprised of Units and Actions, each with traits and abilities that can shape your battle strategy. You are the general, guide your troops to victory!

name: Hunter in the Court of Beasts
FragPunk Pioneer Bundle
description: Kick off your FragPunk fights by bending the rules in style! Purchase the FragPunk pre-order bundle to get platform-exclusive skins, stickers, and a charm as well as the first season’s premium battle pass at an exceptional value!

name: Grandma, No!
description: Step into Grandma's slippers in this hilarious, chaotic adventure where chores become challenges, and things always go... a little off-track. Can you keep things under control, or will the house turn into a whirlwind of chaos?

name: Reversi
description: A game for the Epoch Game Pocket Computer.

name: Mahjongg
description: A game for the Epoch Game Pocket Computer.

name: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
description: Turn back the clock and fight to repair Time itself in this cinematic action platformer with fast sword combat and time-based powers. You are the Warden of Time, Ouro Kronii - be proud and fight hard!

name: Puzzle Game
description: A built-in game for the Epoch Game Pocket Computer.

name: Union Arena Tutorial App
description:
Let’s learn how to play UNION ARENA!
A tutorial app that lets you experience the brand-new trading card game " UNION ARENA" is now available!

name: Foxtale
description: Embark on a thrilling fantasy sci-fi adventure as a courageous little fox! Team up with your animal and alien allies to battle relentless robot foes, discover inspiring stories, and journey across incredible vistas to save your planet from an intergalactic invasion.

name: Arcanum: Theory of Magic
description: This is an idle browser game based around improving as a wizard.

Barcode Battler II: Zelda no Densetsu - Kamigami no Triforce: Link
Mythic Battlegrounds: Demonic Siege
description: A turn-based strategy game where your tactical decisions are key to surviving relentless waves of enemy attacks. While battles unfold automatically, your choices before the clash, such as resource management, unit training, and skill selection, are critical to securing victory.

name: LockYourDoor
description: LockYourDoor is a challenging survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your aim is to survive while you search for your friend Darvin. Try your best to stay alive and confront your nightmares. Only the patient and clever will survive.

name: Dragontwin
description: Dragontwin is an upcoming open-world RPG/Strategy game in which the player shapes their own destiny as a Dragontwin, a legendary mortal soulbound to a powerful dragon.

name: Trade Rivals: Goblin Age
description: In Trade Rivals - Goblin Age, you’ll manage your medieval shop in a vibrant world filled with goblins, wizards, elves, and humans. Your goal? Dominate the market by mastering pricing strategies, securing rare goods, and outmaneuvering your competitors. But beware—your rivals won’t play fair. They’ll curse your business or snatch deals right from under your nose!

name: Infect Cam
description: Infect Cam is a co-op zombie survival game with a bodycam perspective. Team up with friends to strategize and fend off relentless undead waves in a perilous post-apocalyptic world. Manage resources, communicate effectively, and survive the intense challenges that await

name: Mercenary Battlegrounds
description: Mercenary Battlegrounds is an autobattler in the tower defense genre, in which players have to defend their base from waves of monsters and enemy mercenaries. The game takes place in the fantastic galaxy Outcast, which was formed as a result of a unique phenomenon - the conjugation of galaxies.

name: Zeizen
description: Ultra-violent point & click set in Shanghai, China.

name: Exobrave
description: Exobrave is a 2D action-platformer that features a highly engaging combat system. Fight your way through the many branching paths of a futuristic colony infested by demon-possessed automatons - in a solo or co-op adventure!

name: The Fractured Shimmer
description: The Fractured Shimmer is a 2.5D pixel-art survival horror adventure where you follow Eddy, a journalist investigating a string of unsettling murder cases.

name: Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Super-Star
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Super-Kinoko
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Jump
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Nokonoko?
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Fire-Flower
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Manto-Hane
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Bodypress
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Chibi-Yossy
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - 1Up-Kinoko
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Koopa
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Mecha Koopa
Circadial
description: You've been invited to participate in a study for the newly developed Circadial pills, a medicine designed to remedy your life-long insomnia. Explore the empty halls of the facility and the landscapes of your dreams to uncover the source of your night terrors. You will never be the same.

name: Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Kamek
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Ludwig
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Magnum-Killer
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Unbaba
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Bul
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Larry
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Hanachan
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Jugem
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Gooska
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Buibui
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Choropoo
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Manto Game
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - P-Pakkun
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Pata Pata
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Telesauls
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Yossy
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Luigi
Barcode Battler II: Super Mario World - Mario
Machine Mind
description:
What to do if your consciousness is trapped in a metal shell, and all around you is a post-apocalyptic world inhabited by enemies? There is only one task left - to survive at any cost!
Machine Mind is an action game with survival and RTS elements, where you will have to build your own transportation, manage resources, build bases and blow up crazy raiders!
Collect crafts, explore locations and fight to escape and discover all the secrets of this ruined world

name: Indekos
description: Indekos follows university students Roy and Doni sharing a rented room. This action-adventure game blends joy, romance, and personal challenges, letting players experience the highs and lows of student life while navigating their evolving relationship and balancing academics and friendships.

name: Only One
description: Kanye West's "Only One" is a video game about his mother "traveling through the gates of heaven". The title is shared with a song released by Kanye 2 years prior. In his conquest to see the game realised Kanye was turned down several times but now it seems progress has started to be made.

name: App Driver + John The Zombie
description:
Take on the role of an App Driver
+ eat brains to gain skills from them like biking, driving, horseback riding, fishing, climbing, shooting hoops, running

name: Beyond Memories: Darkness of the Soul
description: Don the cloak of a Grim Reaper and free tormented souls in a non-violent, spooky adventure with 11 haunting tales.

name: Caring Critter Bundle
description: Loddlenaut is an ocean cleanup adventure set on a vibrant alien planet. Play as an interstellar custodian who is tasked with cleaning up the pollution left behind by a spacefaring mega-corporation.

name: City Extreme Driving Collection
description: The whole city is your playground!

name: City’s Hero Collection
description: Start working in construction in this realistic and varied simulator or join the elite force tasked with keeping the city safe, clean and comfortable, and its citizens happy!

name: Factory & Roof Collection
description: Under or on the roof, check both driving venues!

name: Furry Twins Oshikake Kemomimi Twins
description:
Dog Ears! Cat Ears! Fox Ears!
Is this a curse, or a test of love?

name: Hidden Worlds Bundle
description: Find hidden cats in cities, cozy spots, magical realms, and spooky Halloween scenes—or uncover springtime bunnies on a cheerful island!

name: Secret Mode's Cozy Collection
description: A Little to the Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Speed & Precision Collection
description: Master your skills in the fastest games!

name: Sunset Coast Collection
description: Solve cases and bring help along the sunset coast!

name: TIny Little Farm Plus Milk Seller
description: Take care of your own plantation with different types of crops.

name: Trip Time Collection
description: Visit famous tourist destinations with our games!

name: Vacation Parking Collection
description: Ever thought about parking on vacation could be tricky?

name: Compensation Not Guaranteed
description: Peek into Southeast Asian politics through a lens darkly. Check ownership for authenticity, listen to stories, decide who should give up their land in the name of PROGRESS!

name: AllKnowing Idol Jesus
description:
Could-ve-been-a-yuri idol girl versions of simon peter and jesus christ.
not meant to be a sincere portrayal of religion.

name: Skeleseller
description: Skeleseller is a laid-back idle game set in a vibrant fantasy world. You're a skeleton shopkeep who hires adventurers to collect loot for you after your untimely demise. Send adventurers into battle, sell what they find, and build up your town!

name: Call of Ponchy: Mahjong Warfare
description: Mahjong TPS. It's a mahjong game with unusual rules, using guns and bats.

name: Schedule I
description: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.

name: Decade
description: Explore an alternate past. Discover how its ideas develop, distort, and disappear. Seed new movements, destroy others. Subvert the rise and fall of empires, art, ideologies, and individuals in this narrative adventure game.

name: Ballistic.exe
description: Ballistic.exe is an advanced weapon simulator, with challenging true-to-life aiming mechanics, full weapon manipulation and customization, and highly accurate ballistic calculations.

name: GeckoShop
description: Collect and sell geckos. Decorate and upgrade your shop. Chase Thieves. Explore the small open-world city, full of charm and life. Sell your lizards, or keep 'em as your Pets!

name: Death Howl
description: Journey through the sorrowful spirit world in a soulslike deck builder. Craft cards and claim powerful totems to defeat the woeful spirits lurking in the mystical lands. Unravel the tale of a grieving mother in her desperate attempt to defy death and bring back her son.

name: Jackal
description: Execute ultra-violent raids in retro 1970s hotels. Master precision and timing to take out bad guys in unforgiving top-down close-combat. No two playthroughs are alike with stackable gameplay mutators and randomly generated rooms.

name: Kaodi
description: Kaodi is a brief, narrative-driven 2D platformer experience where you control Barren on his journey back home after playing a key role in the victory over the Republic of Shan. Explore a kingdom fractured by war and discover the scars it has left on its people.

name: Oath of the Necromancer
description:
Oath of the Necromancer is a rogue-like & bullet-heaven mix; survive by raising hordes of skeletons to fight alongside you against the many foes of ancient Egypt and Greece.

In the name of Serapis, the ancient Graeco-Egyptian God of life and death, you rebuild a lost religion, raise legendary heroes, find mighty relics, and raise powerful armies of the dead.

name: Heart Electric
description:
Heart Electric is a 4-team multiplayer Arena/Hero Shooter video game in active development by Modoyo Studio. The game features a new, resource-stealing game mode, free magnetic movement and unique heroes with abilities and personalities.
Modoyo is hosting frequent playtests for Heart Electric.

name: Cube Crawler
description: Take on the challenge and discover a completely new 3D sci-fi dungeon crawler. The sophisticated room card mechanics and endless generated dungeons with the form of a cube, this game is unique in this genre. What will you discover while exploring?

name: It's On The Mouse
description: Become the best tiny maid on the block! Help Holly and her friends in this little café manager where jumping and running are key to make up for your lack of size! Scuttle around the tables, serve your customers and be careful as dangerous obstacles and bosses will show up to try to stop you!

name: Aegis Force: The Scorian War
description: Aegis Force is a single player, story-driven, strategy RPG (SRPG) that has an engaging grid-based tactical combat system. It is designed in a breathtaking 2.5d pixel art style. Players can recruit for and customize their party, using gameplay that includes full world and town exploration.

name: Monmusu Girls: Autobattler
description: This is a strategic and adventurous idle auto-battler where you'll collect a variety of monmusu girls, form your adventuring team, and challenge the Demon King! Each girl comes with unique skills and bonds, and mastering the right combinations is the key to victory. Embark on a magical journey!

name: Slice Adventure
description: Grab the blade and slice through hordes of enemies in this new "bullet hell" game - Slice Adventure! Control a powerful cursor-sword with simple mouse-only controls. Survive endless waves, check your reflexes, and create unique playstyles using various weapons and items combinations.

name: A Pizza Delivery
description: A Pizza Delivery is a narrative exploration game with puzzle elements focused on connecting with people. Share pizza with charming characters to uncover their stories—and your own. Drive and explore a strange, meditative world filled with secrets.

name: Call The Abyss
description: 2D Survival Arcade Game packed with Action and Dark Magic. You cannot survive the relentless Forces of Good alone. Better call allies from the Abyss!! Gather Resources and Summon them from your Cauldron. Conquer the worldwide Leaderboard. Completely FREE TO PLAY!! For now...

name: Lords of the Void
description: Lords of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy world on the brink of extinction, shattered by a devastating magical Calamity. Lead your people to victory through tough battles, uncovering unique stories behind each faction.

name: Hungry Meem
description: Meems, the hungry creatures that live under the World Tree, are in danger of extinction! Let's make the Meems' lives happy by exploring around the World Tree with them and developing their settlement!

name: 360Hexaworld
description: Another world 360Hexaworld is a Web 3.0 metaverse world platform
Dive into a horror game where each map is uniquely generated procedurally. Survive by stealthily navigating through dark environments to escape the creature known as 3199.
:3 s̶a̶v̶e̶s̶ ̶t̶e̶h̶ ̶w̶o̶r̶l̶d goes from a red place to a blue place in search of a more colorful life, while chasing balls of yarn across switches and potentially dying a lot and solving puzzles.

name: 22 Dayz
description: "22 Dayz" is a thrilling survival adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. In a land ravaged by zombies, bandits, and scarcity, you must protect your family by gathering resources and making tough choices.

name: Imaginary Bad Friend
description: A short visual novel game in which a boy named Shiomi suddenly appears one day, and the protagonist, who recognizes him as an imaginary friend, converses with him to find out what happened between them.

name: My Dad is a Hero
description: 'My Dad is a Hero' is an action RPG adventure where players alternate between two protagonists. The game is structured into three acts, with its core focus on diverse and conceptually unique boss battles.

name: 10 Seconds Dash!
description: Ten-Second Takeover! is a 2D jumping action game with an extremely short time limit of 10 seconds to enjoy a new sense of tension and achievement. Enjoy the ultimate time limit combined with cute character graphics and fast-paced music.

name: Capri Care
description: Capri Care lets you care for and interact with adorable Capri creatures. Compete in fun minigames, breed new colors and traits, and explore a vibrant island. Feed, train, and bond with your Capri to unlock new adventures and surprises in this magical world!

name: Lil Gator Game: In the Dark
description:
In this charming DLC you’ll find that new adventures and friends are just beneath the surface—literally! Get ready to “cave in” to the fun and find that you’re stalag-right where you belong!

This BIG DLC is filled to the brim with all the charm and humour you loved in Lil Gator Game. There is a buddy in every cave and crevasse in this NEW, BIG, UNDERGROUND ADVENTURE!

name: Metroid PrimeHack
description:
PrimeHack is a specialised build of Dolphin authored by Shiiion that introduces traditional first person shooter aiming and controls to the Metroid Prime games, with the goal of making the game play and feel like a native PC game.

PrimeHack is not just a mod of Dolphin, at runtime PrimeHack will modify game code and objects in memory to take direct control of the game.

name: Tentacle Tango
description: Tentacle Tango is a quirky co-op puzzle-platformer where you and a partner must work together, tethered by a flexible tentacle. Don’t let the cute visuals fool you—this game is as challenging as it is charming. Every jump, swing, and tentacle bend requires precise coordination as you navigate puzzles, obstacles, and enemies. Whether playing solo or in local co-op, teamwork is your only path to victory, because after all, it takes two to tango!

name: Hope's Farm 2
description: Build your dream farm in this unique blend of farming and puzzle adventure! Grow crops, raise adorable animals, and solve delightful puzzles to unlock new items and expand your farmland.

name: Project Pantheon
description: An innovative ExtrAction RPG blending high-stakes extraction gameplay with deep hack-and-slash mechanics. Explore a grounded dark fantasy world, battle fierce foes in PvPvE combat, and secure valuable loot—but beware, failure to extract can mean losing it all.

name: Backpack Boy
description: Backpack Boy is off on one of his treks when he discovers a peculiar flashlight that changes the world around him. Explore a seemingly abandoned structure in this puzzle platformer built around mode-swapping.

name: Magic Dungeon Hero: Freedom or Death
Call of Honor: Shooter of Warfare
Dream Team Supreme
description: Pilot a giant robot against a horde of monsters in this co-op roguelike deckbuilder. Attempt each proc-gen run alone or with a friend. Draw from and build up 2 decks at the same time, plan the sequence of each turn, and plug in the best mods. You'll need a big brain, or two, to prevent the invasion!

name: Dragon Ball Z Life
description: Dragon Ball Z Life is a Web RPG game, that is, an idle roleplaying game for browser, you play through the browser of your choice on the platform you want

name: Platoon Commander
description: Platoon Commander is a Real-Time Strategy game focused on the German advance toward Moscow in the fall and winter of 1941. It combines real-time tactical battles with a turn-based campaign map.

name: Forest Reigns
description: Forest Reigns is an emergent FPS set in post-apocalyptic Paris overrun by an evolving forest and its deadly creatures. Adapt to use the ever-changing environment in your favor. Modify your guns, bond with factions and explore the world freely. Your choices will shape the story.

name: Card Coder
description: Card Coder is a card-building roguelike: A novel mix of tactical card battles, inventory management and roguelike deckbuilding, where YOU create custom cards during play. Loot, shop & collect modular ability components to make truly unique cards out of 10 billion possibilities.

name: Palace of a Thousand Curses
description:
Palace of a Thousand Curses is a 2.5D narrative swashbuckling adventure set in an Andalusian fairy tale.

You play as a desperate beggar that has been trapped in an old storybook, where you will duel strange creatures, avoid deadly traps, and confront that most unexpected of enemies: the Spanish Inquisition.

name: Wartorn
description:
Stray Kite Studios, an indie team composed of developers from games including Age of Empires, Borderlands, and BioShock, are proud to announce their first original title, the gorgeous real-time tactics roguelite Wartorn.

Players follow two elven sisters as they journey to reunite their family. Along the way, they confront moral dilemmas and battle external and internal threats, all while utilizing elemental and physics-based systems in their desperate quest for survival. Wartorn is coming to Early Access on Steam and Epic Game Store in Spring 2025.

name: MechAnimals
description: Gear up for mayhem: From the creative minds behind Kung Fu Panda and The Mario Movie, MechAnimals combines Roguelite progression and Beat 'Em Up action featuring cute tiny animal MECH PILOTS!

name: Apocalypse Express
description: Conduct, upgrade and repair your train through endless waves of enemies in a post-apocalyptic setting. In this action management roguelike, the player decides to embark on a journey through the wasteland looking to fulfill the dream of seeing the remains of the outside world.

name: D.C. Re:tune: Da Capo Re:tune
description: Remake of the first Da Capo game featuring a new heroine and a new voice cast

name: Robotville: Dawn of Robot AI
description:
Play Robot, Play! Embark on an extraordinary adventure in a vast, open-world playground, where a futuristic world brimming with endless possibilities awaits you and where robots reign supreme! In this massive immersive 3D open world sandbox you can explore city sky islands, lush serene nature on surrounding islands, and even a subaquatic realm. Race against the clock in thrilling super runs, find hidden collectibles, discover Easter eggs, compete in unpredictable challenges, or simply wander and marvel at the stunning scenery while you navigate through diverse ecosystems and explore this endless 3D open world sandbox.
Robotville is a 3D open world sandbox filled with wonder and excitement, where endless exploration and replayability are limitless. With teleports to all world locations, traveling throughout the game is a breeze to breathtaking nature landscapes filled with realistic plants and animals from planet Earth and other alien worlds, all brought to life with stunning realism. Immerse yourself in a vibrant universe where robots and nature coexist in perfect harmony.

name: Galaxy Princess Zorana
description: You are the Evil Emperor's only daughter, but can you claim the throne? Raise stats, make deals, appoint advisors, and scheme your way through the Imperial Election - unless an assassin gets you first. Rule the galaxy or die trying!

name: Imaginytes
description: A blend of roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense. You summon and evolve creatures, cast spells, and defend against waves of nightmares in 3d fantasy battles.

name: Egress Protocol
description:
Egress Protocol is a dark party indie game in which the player must ascend an infinite tower with progressingly difficult enemies.

~Part of the Vitalisis Systems Incorporated lore line~

name: Pixel Duel
description: Unlicensed mobile RPG gacha game, about collecting anime characters and assembling a team of 5 fighters to take on a multitude of game modes.

name: Cruft
description: Cruft is a 2D, pixel-art crafting game. It has a minimalist aesthetic and boasts tons of crafting recipes. While moment-to-moment play is open-ended, it features a prestige system that grants bonuses on future playthroughs.

name: Forklift Certified
description: Welcome to Forklift Certified, a unique single-player 3D top-down puzzle experience where you can kick back, unwind, and enjoy clever challenges at your own pace. Take control of a forklift to navigate intricate puzzles, activate mechanisms, and conquer challenges in handcrafted levels

name: Pokemon Empire
description:
What is right and wrong? Who gets to decide? And why does everyone follow so blindly? Welcome to the Telius region, only months removed from a bloody civil war sparked by the actions of the tyrannical King, Tobias II. A once benevolent man who ushered in an era of prosperity and industry, he eventually plunged the region into division and violence. In the end, he was overthrown by his own people. Amidst the ensuing chaos and turmoil, a new council of representatives has taken power, supported by the revolutionaries that overthrew the king's regime. This 'grand council' is now in charge of overseeing the reconstruction of the region and establishing a new Pokemon league. But even under this supposed new stability, old fissures remain. Many Telius citizens detest the new government and how it operates and remain loyal to the longstanding traditions of supporting the nobility. This nobility and their soldiers, now on the outside looking in, has adopted the moniker 'Team Royale'. Operating from the shadows, they are a group intent on restoring the region to its former glory days under a new king. So with the region war-torn and divided, how will Telius move into the future? Enter YOU the player: the child of a noble family, you were sent away before the war began. Now that the war has ended, you, along with your best friend Alanah, return to Telius to fulfill a promise to conquer the Pokemon league and to bring the entire region of Telius into harmony once more. Can you solve the mysteries of the war, work your way through the shadows of the past, and become champion of the Telius League? Will you support the grand council, fight for the Royale loyalists, or take matters into your own hands? How will you define your legacy in Pokemon Empire?

RPG Maker Pokemon fangame with Pokemon up through Generation 9 with several rebalances to both individual Pokemon and the general systems.

name: Themis
description: THEMIS is a 3rd person puzzle platformer filled with mind-boggling challenges and non-linear narrative. Inspired by games like Portal and Dark Souls, players will be tasked with overcoming death traps and obstacles employing both wits as well as quick reflexes.

name: Timelake: Time Travel Tactics
description: Timelake: Time Travel Tactics is a roguelite strategy game where you control time itself to outsmart enemies and navigate a shifting city. Predict enemy moves, set traps, and execute synchronized combos. Manage precious resources as you explore a dreamlike world filled with mystery, cosmic horror, and ever-changing challenges. Every decision ripples through time, offering endless strategic possibilities.

name: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator
description: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator is a quirky and humorous simulation game that lets players step into the shoes of JoshGeoff's unique worker, a character navigating through bizarre cities and locations. Set in the UK, the game blends elements of exploration and interaction with an emphasis on comedic storytelling and quirky dialogue. Players are tasked with completing unusual challenges, all while collecting things for your boss.

name: Demon Dust
description: Demon Dust is a Survival Horror Dungeon Crawler with a unique, mouse driven interface. Scavenge the depths of concrete and metal while rationing supplies to stay alive.

name: Deficit
description: You are a corporate espionage freelancer. Your latest assignment: steal the reality-shifting Interpolator from the sprawling research labs of Project Sidereal. Use the device to escape the grueling defensive layers of Hadrian's Wall and cross the threshold into the strangest frontiers of reality.

name: Hell Maiden
description: This is an original retelling of the Italian Renaissance classic Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri. AstralShift did confirm it will branch out from the familiar horror RPG genre of its previous titles.

name: The House of the Dead 2: Remake
description: The House of the Dead 2: Remake is a remake of the second entry in the well-known and popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous undead monsters standing in your way.

name: Cybrlich and the Death Cult of Labor
description: An adrenaline fueled FPS/boomer shooter about a buff barbarian hacker taking down an evil undead corporate overlord

name: 2Unreal5Underground
description:
A fangame that aims to remake the gameplay and story of Need for Speed: Underground 2. It originally started in Unreal Engine 4, titled 2Unreal4Underground, but it has since moved to a custom version of UE5 to utilize its features.

TUFU is in active development and had an alpha release at the end of 2024.

name: Under Your Spell
description: "Under Your Spell" is an immersive text-based magic school and dating simulator, drawing inspiration from beloved games like True Love 95 and Persona 4. As the protagonist, you'll juggle the challenges of school life while navigating the complexities of romance and participating in the highly anticipated "Cup of Cathal"

name: Sledding Game
description: Sledding Game is a cozy, online multiplayer game about sledding, relaxing, and hanging out with your friends.

name: Total Loadout
description: Total Loadout is a PvP inventory management auto battler where heroes and villains from across space and time clash with powerful weapons! Choose your Celebrity with special abilities and items, then outwit opponents turn by turn by arranging your inventory tactically to build an unbeatable Loadout.

name: Yedesna Shoots 3
description: Yedesna shoots 3 is an asteroids like game where you play as, uh, Yedesna!

name: Maze Mice
description: Maze Mice is a bullet heaven roguelite where time only moves when you move. Collect dots, level up, choose upgrades, and avoid cats. All at your own pace.

name: Sit-Back Attack
description:
Sit-Back Attack is a game where you can sit back and let it grind for you!
It is an Idle RPG WITHOUT any MTX!

Features 45+ different classes, 500+ different skills, unlimited amount of build options to help make the team of 4 heroes you control defeat over 300 monsters!

A very in-depth interface that allows you to see every facet of battle, stats, and more to help you decide how to make your team even stronger!

All classes have unique character art and their own skills, strengths, and weaknesses.

You can choose from 1 of 4 pets to help bolster your team and you control when it uses it's special attack.

An alchemy craft that allows you to use potions on your allies and enemies manually! This craft can be improved with a characters skills and gear.

So much more!

name: Escape Road 2
description: Throughout the course of Escape Road 2, players will find themselves in a variety of dangerous circumstances, ranging from urban settings to natural terrains, each of which is packed with its own set of challenges. The user-friendly controls of the game make it simple for players to manage their avatar, enabling them to quickly navigate difficulties, such as jumping over barriers, sliding under obstructions, and running away from threats.

name: Monster Crown: Sin Eater
description: Explore the beautiful and detailed environments of Crown Nation, breed endless monsters with the most robust and polished true crossbreeding system devised in a video game.

name: Pokémon Study: Hikaruze! Pokémon Typing PC
Soreike! Anpanman: Hajimete Dekita yo! Oboeta yo! Anpanman Hitori de Dekichatta!
Tamagopanda no Muchuu Land ni Youkoso!: Waku-waku Taiken Stamp Rally 100
description: The main title for the console ePico, made by SEGA FAVE.

name: Sezhar's Shell Cells
description:
Just imagine that you died and some day just woke up, but not at home like you wanted to, but in an endless void of... nothing?
Sezhar isn't mad at you, she is just frustrated.
Be so nice and endure her wrath a bit longer. :)

name: A Merchant's Promise
description: First person Medieval Trading & Transport Simulator. Start as a Peasant and work your way to Royalty as you carefully handle and transport your goods through a stylized Medieval World!

name: SweetCat
description: Your family has gone on vacation without you. Can you help little Milio until they return? Feed him, dress him, decorate his room, and play with him so he doesn’t feel lonely in this virtual pet simulator.

name: Lingo 2
description: Lingo 2 blends word puzzles and impossible geometry, with brand new puzzle mechanics and a large, colorful world to discover. Welcome back!

name: Ropebound
description: Swing through ropes and overcome obstacles.

name: Black Beacon
description: Black Beacon is an action-packed RPG set in a world where ancient prophecies come to life. After the arrival of the "Seer," a mysterious black monolith known as the "Beacon" activates, unleashing strange anomalies around the Tower of Babel. These anomalies are far from mythical—they hide powerful secrets that could reshape humanity's future.

name: Now I'm Home
description: Build your purr-fect business empire with 50+ unique cats, each with their own special talents. Collect rare breeds, create powerful combinations, and manage your growing feline empire through challenging scenarios. With 50+ distinctive cats, countless items, and endless strategic possibilities

name: Project Deniz
description: Deniz, seeks redemption in a near-future world on the brink of collapse. Betrayed by those in power, she embarks on a journey of revenge, aiming to uncover the truth behind her betrayal.

name: Astropulse: Reincarnation
description: Set on a war-torn future Earth where the planet's biological evolution was drastically altered by a meteorite strike

name: Bounty Sword: Satellaview Special Time Attack Version
Tensou Sentai Goseiger Super Battle Daishuugou!
Waking up in LS
description:
Waking up in LS is a short exploration videogame where you play as a usual citizen in "Linha de Sintra", the area where a railway link connects Lisbon and Sintra.

As a resident of this unique area, you'll come across a cast of bizarre and outlandish characters, each with their own hilarious quirks and idiosyncrasies.

Explore Queluz´s train station, residential areas, and strange and surreal corners. You'll come across bizarre situations that will make you laugh out loud and shake your head in disbelief.

"Waking up in LS" is a game that will keep you entertained and amused for a couple minutes, with its pixel art graphics, and a irreverent sense of humour. Whether you like exploration games or just want to laugh, "Waking up in LS" will make you smile and leave you wanting more.

name: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
description: Ketz: Galactic Overlords is a roguelite RPG bullet heaven with a universe blending Science and Fantasy, where you challenge the dark forces that disrupt the galactic balance on the planet Ketz. Witness the deep stories of Galactic Leaders who oppose the disruption of galactic balance and support you with various blessings. Discover the dynamic connections between them and uncover the mysterious secrets of the planet Ketz!

name: Doors: The Game!
description: Doors is a 2D platformer based on the animated series of the same name. For over 10 years Doors has been a collaborative effort featuring a record-breaking amount of artists coming together, each designing and animating their own room linked together to form one long adventure!

name: Heist Schoolers
description: Heist your own school to get the exams' answers and discover why so many students have disappeared in Noirmont High. Spooky and nostalgic.

name: Morning Star
description:
Discover the mysteries of a forgotten world in Morning Star. Explore a vast, decaying land full of strange creatures and ancient ruins. Wander through breathtaking, magical places, but also venture into shadowy, haunting, and dangerous realms, all brought to life with stunning hand-drawn 2D visuals.

Morning Star is an atmospheric Metroidvania that plunges you into a mysterious world filled with both haunting darkness and breathtaking beauty. As a cloaked figure with no memory of your past, you wield a powerful weapon and embark on a journey through a vast, interconnected realm. Along the way, you'll uncover secrets, confront terrifying creatures, and piece together a story that forces you to question your identity.

name: GlitchGuesser
description:
Step back into the nostalgia of the early internet with GlitchGuesser, the ultimate party game that turns pixelated chaos into a thrilling guessing competition! As distorted, compressed images gradually become clear, it’s a race against time to figure out what you’re seeing. Can you guess before anyone else?

Whether it’s a movie still, an anime character, a famous brand, or even custom creations, GlitchGuesser offers endless fun for players of all skill levels.

name: Look At Me
description: Look At Me is a first-person horror game where you must escape from a haunted house by solving puzzles and facing terrifying paranormal phenomena.

name: Acid Web
description: Defend your web from an onslaught of strange creatures to the beat of a dynamic, generative acid techno soundtrack in this all-nonsense arcade-style twin stick shooter.

name: Steamboat Willie Incident
description: Steamboat Willie Incident is a 3D horror survival game where you are captured in a steamboat and you have to find ways to escape without alerting Willie. Try to find clues, solve puzzles and hide from Willie in a claustrophobic steamboat where you are surrounded only by sea. Will you be able to?

name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City 2001
description: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City 2001 is a lore friendly total conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto 3 that attempts to make the game more in line with its counterparts from later in the 3D era by updating gameplay as well as design direction to match that of its successors.

name: City of Voices
description: A short Golden Idol-like deduction game about a young girl who is catapulted from her suburban life into a mysterious adventure. Investigate a series of moments frozen in time. Examine clues and solve puzzles to uncover a story full of twists and turns.

name: Fentanyl Edition
description: Fentanyl Edition is a Fast-Paced Arena Shooter. With the most surreal visuals you may lay your eyes upon.

name: Beneath a Dead City
description: Run your own Adventurer's Guild in this fantasy colony sim with a focus on dynamic storytelling. Recruit heroes to explore a ruined city, but keep an eye on those murder hobos. An unhappy hero could turn to arson, violence, and jaywalking.

name: Megabonk
description: Smash your way through endless waves of enemies and grow absurdly powerful! Grab loot, level up, unlock characters and upgrade to create unique and crazy builds as you fend off hordes of creatures!

name: Saintess of the Golden Bow
description:
Celine thought her life as an American office worker was mundane, but after a fatal accident, she wakes up as an extra character in her favorite web novel a BL tragedy fantasy. Expected to die early as part of the protagonist's backstory, Celine defies fate and survives her death event, causing a butterfly effect that catapults her into the role of the Saintess of the Golden Bow.

Joined by an unforgettable cast of characters including the valiant knight Levi, the enigmatic Mad Prince Noah, and the devout High Priest Elijah you must lead a quest to defeat the Demon Queen and bring peace to the realm. Each choice you make weaves a complex web of romance, friendship, and sacrifice, offering a deeply personal and replayable journey.

name: Reksio i Kretes: Sermageddon
description: The temple of the Cheesegod has been stolen! The weather is going crazy… Could it be that the enraged Cheesegod is bringing Cheesemageddon down upon the Earth? Who would dare commit such a sacrilege? Pirates? Aliens? One thing is certain — our heroes will be forced to return to the darkest location of all their adventures — Paris.

name: Tree of Savior: Neverland
description:
Embark on a Timeless Journey of Love, The Carnival Edition is here!

"Tree of Savior: Neverland" Carnival Edition is Here!

Experience the all-new Tree Bond System by hosting a romantic Tree Ceremony; rally your allies and prepare to face the challenge of the new Demon God Dungeon Boss!
Don't forget to log into the New Adventure Server to claim 120 free draws, an 8-piece gold gear set, and an exclusive 4-piece golden fashion set for free!

Let's Embark on a Timeless Journey of Love!

The dream-filled Tree of Savior now continues with its official masterpiece, "Tree of Savior: Neverland"!

Produced by Kim Hakkyu, with music by Motoi Sakuraba, featuring masterful visuals and soundtracks, it's a heartwarming MMO filled with joy and wonder!

name: Imprisoned
description:
Imprisoned is a Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG) developed with the Unreal Engine 5 graphics engine and advanced predictive artificial intelligence system.

Your objective is to serve your sentence and survive within a hostile prison as a persistent world. During your time behind bars, you must create a character, level up, improve it, and obtain protections and weapons through missions or by eliminating certain enemies you will encounter during your journey through the prison.

name: Dodd Goes To The Museum
description: Explore Dodd's local museum in this short, casual and relaxing adventure! Visit various exhibits within the museum's four wings and talk to various characters along the way!

name: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room
description: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room is a psychological horror game set from the perspective of a Japanese high school student in a New York apartment complex.

name: Project TurboBlast
description: Drift, boost, and spin around corners at BLASTING SPEEDS in this stylish Singleplayer + Multiplayer Arcade Racing game, Blending the familiar drifting of Kart racers and tight responsive handling of classic Anti-Gravity racing games. With a focus on being easy to pick up but difficult to master.

name: Tempest Tower
description: Protect your tower from invading Creepers using wild contraptions, powerful upgrades, or maybe just... jump on their heads! Tempest Tower reinvents Tower Defense with a thrilling mix of strategic base-building and engaging player-driven combat! Can you withstand the onslaught and save Trip Space?

name: The Violets of Amicus
description: Attack, dodge, and counter the monsters invading the land of Velare in The Violets of Amicus, a 2D action-adventure inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and modern combat games alike. The ferocious Violets are waking from their ancient gardens. Can a lowly courier save the kingdom?

name: Stormbridge
description: Build a bridge settlement while outrunning an impending storm in this roguelite city builder. Unlock upgrades and pets between runs as you unravel the storm's origin. Can you survive and build the longest self-sufficient bridge?

name: Dipets
description: Dipets is a casual RPG where you have to explore and help rebuild the city of a weird world while taking care of a virtual pet.

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Survive. Hunt. Thrive. In "The Hunter's Path," immerse yourself in a top-down survival hunting game. Navigate through the terrain, stalk your prey, and craft your needed supplies.

name: Due
description:
Due is a short first person horror, climbing / walking simulator.

In the far future, take control of someone tasked with appeasing the Gods to regain their tribe's life source - water.

Made for the 48 hour Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend Jam.

A spiritual predecessor to Kill the KOTH

name: Little Corner Tea House
description: Little Corner Tea House is a casual simulation game where you can make favorite drinks and talk with different customers to relax.

name: Road Rash 2
description: An unreleased Game Gear port of Road Rash II.

name: DCA3
description: An unofficial reverse-engineering project that brings Grand Theft Auto III to the Dreamcast.

name: Pokémon Puffy Pink
description: A Pokémon Fire Red ROM hack that replaces all 151 Pokémon with Kirby characters, complete with movesets, abilities, stat spreads, etc.

name: Fossilpunk
description: Lead space dino settlers to rebuild your civilization and rise again! Start cities, expand borders, grow your economy, and master tactical battles. Unleash epic dino combos in this turn-based strategy game with 4X and Roguelite elements. Rawr!

name: Garland Boy
description: GARLAND FOR SALE! A game about a boy who earn his living by selling flower garlands to cars waiting in a traffic light at the intersection. Save enough money and follow his big dream. When the traffic light turns red, your job begins!

name: Kyrie and Terra
description: Explore Grand Terra's fantasy world through a Japanese RPG. Recruit Celestia, customize them, and gather skill cards and equipment to build your unique party. Save the world in this epic tale of money's power.

name: Scribblemania
description:
Dive into a chaotic and surreal adventure where your artistic imagination is your greatest weapon! When your late-night spaceship sketch tears open reality, you and your best friend are thrust into an alien world teeming with bizarre creatures, quirky puzzles, and hilarious encounters.

Use your magical doodle device to draw shapes that come to life — smashing obstacles, fighting foes, and solving mind-bending challenges. Will your artistic genius save the day or destroy it? Grab your stylus and sketch your way to survival!

name: Garuda Emblem
description:
Garuda Emblem is a beat ‘em up game with a taste of RPG content, where you can roam freely in the game’s beautifully hand-drawn world, get immersed in the story, and be the good journalist you are.

Play as Garuda Emblem members, a journalistic student activity unit that uncovers the truth behind the shady part of UNION. As the story unfolds, you’ll encounter various figures that’ll help you along in the journey. You can also upgrade your characters with different skills and abilities using your accumulated experience by beating your enemies to pulp!

Got bored of the main story? Refresh yourself with various side quests and mini games you can discover around the game’s world! Who knows, there might be secrets lying right in front of you all along!

name: White Room: Mind’s Prison
description: White Room: Mind's Prison is a psychological horror game. You're not allowed to make any sound. Entities will make you scream. Stay quiet! The day counter will increase as you survive! Survive as long as possible.

name: Garden of Wandering Souls
description: Garden of Wandering Souls is a Tower Defense game with a roguelite twist, featuring two unique mechanics: path building and tower attack range patterns that resemble puzzles, with narrative and visuals inspired by Indonesia’s Borobudur Temple, the world's largest Buddhist temple.

name: Village Meow
description: Play as Kiti who was a city cat that moved into Village Meow after Kiti’s owner died. Now Kiti is in debt by the local corrupted Mayor, Bos Oyen, after being tricked. Kiti has a choice to either pay off his debts or unite with other villagers to drive out Bos Oyen.

name: Jiwa: The Damned Soul
description: A first-person adventure set in an abandoned Indonesian hospital, where two content creators are in dire need of going viral. Explore alternatively as Sekar and Laras to discover and reveal all of the secrets you saw to the world.

name: Thousands Layered Blade: Reforged
description: Thousands Layered Blade: Reforged is an action-packed action RPG game that immerses players in a stunning 3D world inspired by traditional sumi-e art, now enhanced with realistic brush stroke simulations.

name: Ganyang Setan Alas: The Game
description: Ganyang Setan Alas! The Game is a single-player shooter set in a haunted Indonesian forest, where four students, armed with a range of weapons, must survive relentless zombie attacks and escape a cursed fate.
